abstract: At the age of 70, Carl C. Icahn has gone from being a corporate raider to a “shareholder activist.”
snippet: At the age of 70, Carl C. Icahn has gone from being a corporate raider to a “shareholder activist.”
lead_paragraph: “A large number of companies in this country are badly run,” Carl C. Icahn said the other day. “Terribly run. That’s one of the reasons I’m successful.”

headline.main: From Raider to Activist, but Still Icahn
headline.print_headline: From Raider To Activist, But Still Icahn
